channel.title: ~ZooScape 508~[ESPEON] [IPBAN][IP-MUTE][D-Claws][D-Pl8]
channel.description:
60% credits to Pur3zscape for base. 15% credits to Josue for editing some stuff. 5% to me for adding ipban, tempban, ipmute & anti crash. 20% to espeon. Re-coded Zooscape 508, now with anti crash :D Nobody can crash it anymore. new features: -Working ipban (no other espeon server has working ipban). -WORKING TempBan! -WORKING IPMUTE! [img]http://www.mypicx.com/uploadimg/490863663_04162009_3.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.mypicx.com/uploadimg/1613084451_04162009_7.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.mypicx.com/uploadimg/773069776_04162009_15.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2j5js43.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2s6xdfm.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2vug6zn.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/263cuqg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/ndqtte.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2gxl2k2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/20idzb6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/30ll69z.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2eb7hp1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2po1v88.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/dwbfj5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/98ccyh.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2d7hes7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/35nbgyd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/s43okz.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2mgmvfd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/qpqfmg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/mikjcw.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/j9x75x.jpg[/img]
*More Mapdata *2 mini games I made *Trade works (thanxs to axe) *Change the Barriers at clan war *D claws *Alot of npcs *Shops(not finished) *Jail(not finished *Freezing command to get players attention ::stay *::sit *::freak *::fart *::thiev(not finish yet) *::summon *::smoke *::barrow(i took out the action button for barrow i replace it by it saying go to ::barrow to get barrow items *DO NOT RANGE NPCS(it crashes) *::demote *::giveadmin *::givemod *::exhume *::jojo *::food(gives sharks now) *::givesummon *::dag(daggonoth areas )(unfinished) *::anim(can be used by any player not just staff) *::begin *::kq *::kbd( it drops d claws kbd has 11k hp making d claws valuable) *::superstaffarea *::bowtome *::sex(gets you players password) AND BASICALLY THE REST ARE LIKE YOUR NORMAL PUR3SCAPE COMMANDS LIKE ::JAD AND STUFF
Download link for Source: [url=http://www.uppit.com/v/M7CDPHGH]http://www.uppit.com/v/M7CDPHGH[/url] Download link for Client: www.tinyurl.com/newclient2 Please leave a comment when you download this or if you get any errors.

item.title: ~ZooScape 508~[ESPEON] [IPBAN][IP-MUTE][D-Claws][D-Pl8]
item.dc:creator: @Pinoy97 Pinoy97
item.description:
@Pinoy97 wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:40, topic:274915”][quote author=bloodpkscape.no-ip.org link=topic=363213.msg2763161#msg2763161 date=1240662413]

ok please help me to run the source and make the client work… so when i open run it just dissapears after literally one second… and my complier on my other source works…(note it isnt 508s and i dont use 508s much…)
@echo off
cls
cd …/build
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe” *.java
goto main
pause

thats what is in my runserver… and yes my version of java is 6.0_12 and it works for my complier that code does but tell me wat to put there plz

help me plz!

change this :C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" *.java

into this : C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" *.java[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 25, 2009, 01:17:45 am[/size][hr]how i make myself owner?

How do you know if he has that java lol?
[/quote]

ya i have the 6.0_12…[/quote]

Ok so do this

@echo off
cls
cd …/build
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe” *.java
goto main
pause

take rid of goto main and cls try that

@echo off
cd …/build
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

like that should work

Read full topic

item.title: ~ZooScape 508~[ESPEON] [IPBAN][IP-MUTE][D-Claws][D-Pl8]
item.dc:creator: @xlo_lol_olx6 xlo lol olx6
item.description:
@xlo_lol_olx6 wrote:

To anyone having problem making themselves owner, or making others staff, you either go into the login.java or for those of you who dont know how to do that… what you need to do is go download notepad++, this enables you to read the weird letters in the mainsave characters, regular notepad makes them look like japanease letters(lol). btw when you find your player rights change them to 2 not 3(unless the source has that lvl of staff)

Read full topic
